Interface Cell

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCell, AbstractShipCell, AbstractWaterCell, EnemyShipCell, GapWaterCell, OpenSeaWaterCell, SpecificShipCell

    public interface Cell
    Represents a generic cell.
